1.flavor_text: Enables the user to perform first in the next turn.

2.flavor_text: Enables the user to perform last in the next turn.

4.flavor_text: Earn +2 if the Judge’s Voltage goes up.

5.flavor_text: A basic performance using a move known by the Pokémon.

6.flavor_text: Earn +3 if no other Pokémon has chosen the same Judge.

7.flavor_text: Allows performance of the same move twice in a row.

8.flavor_text: Increased Voltage is added to the performance score.

9.flavor_text: Earn +15 if all the Pokémon choose the same Judge.

10.flavor_text: Lowers the Voltage of all Judges by one each.

11.flavor_text: Earn double the score in the next turn.

12.flavor_text: Steals the Voltage of the Pokémon that just went.

13.flavor_text: Prevents the Voltage from going up in the same turn.

14.flavor_text: Makes the order of contestants random in the next turn.

15.flavor_text: Earns double the score on the final performance.

16.flavor_text: Raises the score if the Voltage is low.

17.flavor_text: Earn +2 if the Pokémon performs first in the turn.

18.flavor_text: Earn +2 if the Pokémon performs last in the turn.

19.flavor_text: Prevents the Voltage from going down in the same turn.

20.flavor_text: Earn +3 if two Pokémon raise the Voltage in a row.

21.flavor_text: Earn a higher score the later the Pokémon performs.

22.flavor_text: Earn +3 if the Pokémon that just went hit max Voltage.

23.flavor_text: Earn +3 if the Pokémon gets the lowest score.
